> Kup Looked aroundtrying to find out what to do next, when he picked up 
> a familiar signature... YES !! He remebered it, it was the "Clone" of 
> Hydras, Megatron x; his brother and he were in Maximal's ranks long 
> time ago.
> 
> "Megatron... do you copy?"said Kup by Comlink "It's Kup!!!" 
> 
> "Grimlock is confused" said the t-rex robot.

Legacy consulted his record of events and examined what he knew of this Megatron X. Information was spotty at best due to the sparseness of records of this time period. However what he did find did not ease his mind. 

Legacy transformed from his tank mode into robot as he approached Grimlock. For a moment he studied the T-rex his head tilting. Then he spoke, his voice as ever deep and powerful, "WHAT DO YOU KNOW OF THIS MEGATRON X?" 

(TAG Grimlock)

Preston
